title: Must Watch: 2021 X-Games Real MTB Edits from all athletes inc. Danny & Vero
content:
X-Games have added MTB to their Real Series for 2021, with some of the World’s most inspiring mountain bike athletes going head to head with their 90 second edits. Submissions for all six athletes are in; Veronique Sandler, Danny MacAskill, Brage Vestavik, DJ Brandt, Brandon Semenuk and Cam Zink show us their finest and wildest […]

The post Must Watch: 2021 X-Games Real MTB Edits from all athletes inc. Danny & Vero appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
